title: ATSAILLH - Monument Mine Edition

replies.body:
i flew to a monument in mczone, I still had fly from spectator and was like "cool". it really looked like hacks.
(pls no ban for glitch abuse, this happened a while ago T_T and I only did it once c:)

replies.body: oh yeah, that was pretty stupid not to say "I still had fly from spectator", because now like 90% of the people who read that will think I used hacks xD
